Name: サチ江 -死道-/Sachie -Death Road-
About the game: A woman who works for a black company deep in the mountains. She has one week left until she retires. It happens on the usual road you're supposed to be used to returning to... bizarre... Can you survive a week in safety? Who the hell is Sachie Why is the woman (the main character) being attacked? It's a first-person Japanese horror game developed by a Japanese indie team! Game system Simple gameplay that can be completed by simply returning home the same way for 7 days. The ending is prepared according to the clearing condition and procedure. Also, we recommend you to use headphones because sound is the key to the game. Game operation method ・Move forward, backward, left and right with WASD. ・Shift key dash ・Mouse left → Examine the target object → Event occurs when the conditions are met (cursor turns green) ・Mouse right →Hold/throw (cursor turns red) ・Escape key → End of game ・'O' and 'P' keys → Brightness adjustment About English translation The main story part was translated into English by a translator and the rest of the system used machine translation. About saving Saves are automatically saved when the number of days and the progress are recorded and 'from the beginning' and 'crossing over days'. Even if you select 'from the beginning', only the progress data such as days and standings will be reset. Since the game clear information remains, you can play safely on the second lap. About game status -When playing the game, there is no problem if the following conditions are met. → Describe this store page on the video details page → Follow Twitter @FooNnProject
